Mission Orders

Dark beings fill the halls of the Cultists' Refuge.

Kill {@LinkCreature:489#3603#mercenary berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3604#mercenary mystics}, {@LinkCreature:489#3605#mercenary reavers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3606#mercenary archers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3701#mercenary lancers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3702#mercenary sorcerers}, and {@LinkCreature:489#3703#mercenary slayers}.

Report to the nearest coordinator when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
